story: Karim Elsahy shared Elves - Your Personal Little Helper's photo to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Elves - Your Personal Little Helper
description:

AlMakinah graduates are basically guaranteed great jobs in one of the most sought after fields and can boast being taught and mentored by Egyptâ€™s greatest tech minds.
